website_summaries.verdict: The flavor on this jerky delivers at a decent price.
pros: Teriyaki flavor is on the sweet side but is still low carb
Jack Links also makes jerky out of other types of meat, like chicken and pork
cons: This jerky contains both wheat and soy, which might be a challenge for some people

customer_reviews.title: My Fury Friend loves this; just like me
customer_reviews.text: I received my bag of Jack Links Teriyaki Beef Jerk and proceeded to open the bag, my little fury stopped eating her food and ran towards to me and starred at me, waiting for me to give her a small piece to nibble on it and I gave her piece; she ate it and begged for more, a gave a tiny pieces and now she's taking a nap on my bed...unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a snack! I love many of their different flavors! Jack Links are the only brand I’ll buy. #1 fan for life!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa LeMasters

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this for a snack and its easy to open and easy to save for later to
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Jerky
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really good. Really salty and savory, and the meat goes pretty tender when you chew on it for a minute. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Botzong

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Good taste. The jerky is in big and small chunks. Like any other types.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I liked was that it shipped fast. BUT when I received it the package was tore open and the jerky was spilt out all over the box. I can not eat this product I bought because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I love Jack Link's Beef Jerky! The Teriyaki flavor is awesome. Product arrived in good condition. Once opened the smell was appealing. The beef jerky was fresh tasting. Flavor was balanced and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Frances HamptonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Had a slightly off flavor. Edible, but I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be bigger
customer_reviews.text: great product on the inside just a little sad about the size, no big deal though. better meat than your husband could ever have.
customer_reviews.author: Mya nicole

customer_reviews.title: long pieces not lil crubles like in some others
customer_reviews.text: the taste is great flavor and stays fresh long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo size!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the jumbo size!! Fresh and fast delivery. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Good jerky!
customer_reviews.text: Good jerky, overpriced like 90% of jerky. The flavor is strong and long lasting. I would prefer if there more of the thicker chewier chunks, and less of he thinner dried out ones.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Price to procduct sixe
customer_reviews.text: For the size price is at or slightly higher the retailers but st on subscribe and save it’s not a bad price at all,mines all been fresh and wrapped
customer_reviews.author: Marine

customer_reviews.title: great snack
customer_reviews.text: shared with the dog, she eats more than me good flavor and it was still fresh
customer_reviews.author: ,cullengeneral

customer_reviews.title: Actually rotten meat
customer_reviews.text: Its beef jerky. It showed up pretty quickly but it was rancid and rotten somehow. I'm going to chalk it up to bad luck this one time.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Diet friendly protein snack
customer_reviews.text: Jack Links Teriaki is a great high protein, low fat snack to have in my desk draw. Keeps me away from more tempting high calorie snacks during the day. Very flavorful and chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Gwench

customer_reviews.title: The only good quality jerky out there
customer_reviews.text: Fresh and tasty! A great snack and it's not too tough like other brands. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Had a weird consistency but we still ate it, it was ok
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Best jerky we've eaten in years. Now we're frequent buyers of Jack Link's Teriyaki beef Jerky.
customer_reviews.text: This teriyaki jerky is the first I've had in years. Based on the positive reviews I decided to give it a try and bought this 5 pk size and we liked it so much thats we decided to sign up for regular deliveries now. Not too sweet or peppery. Not too dry or too moist. The flavor is perfect. You should definately give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and buy it from several locations (Sam's/Amazon/Gas Station/etc) fairly often. The last bag I got from Amazon had a lighter color to the meat and a funny taste. I ate 2 pieces and spit it back out. I think it was somehow spoiled because it was absolutely disgusting this time.
customer_reviews.author: Doomstang

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy beef jerky and I frequently purchase this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: These came in and were very stale. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KWdriver

product_meta.title: Jack Link’s Beef Jerky, Teriyaki, 5.85 oz. Sharing Size Bag – Flavorful Meat Snack, 11g of Protein and 80 Calories, Made with 100% Beef - 96% Fat Free, No Added MSG or Nitrates/Nitrites
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Teriyaki| *:Beef JerkyThink way back. Like even before that. Ancient civilizations fueled themselves with meat. If it worked for them, it can definitely help you power thru. You may not be crossing treacherous seas, but endless to-dos, kid activities and trying to squeeze in a workout can feel just like it. 
Jack Link’s Teriyaki Beef Jerky is a delicious combination of East meets West delicious. Each strip is made with 100% premium beef that is marinated with our special blend of soy, garlic, ginger and brown sugar. Then, it’s slow cooked over hardwood smoke for the perfect smoky flavor. Packed with 11 of protein per serving, it’s 96% fat free and has no added MSG, nitrates or nitrites. The result? A taste kids of all ages enjoy. 
The jumbo 5.85 oz. bag is perfect for sharing with family and friends, or, if you’re like us, hiding in that secret spot and keeping it all for yourself. So, when you’re in a snacking mood, skip the chips or carb-heavy crackers and grab Jack Link’s Teriyaki Beef Jerky to help keep you satisfied. 
Jack Link’s is America’s #1 selling jerky brand. When you open a Jack Link’s meat snack, you get a taste of the American tradition that made this family business a success: hard work, fun and quality products. Our protein snacks are the fuel to help you Feed Your Wild Side.
feature_bullets: MADE WITH 100% BEEF – Our Teriyaki Beef Jerky is the stuff dreams are made of: lean cuts of 100% premium beef, 96% fat free and no added MSG or nitrates/nitrites.

GOOD SOURCE OF PROTEIN – Protein is an essential part of diets and our Teriyaki Beef Jerky is a great way to get more. With 11g of protein and 80 calories per serving, it’s a protein-packed meat snack that helps keep you satisfied when you need it most.

RESEALABLE SHARING SIZE –The jumbo 5.85 oz. sharing size bag is resealable and has about 6 servings in each bag. It’s perfect for sharing with family and friends or to stash in your secret spot and keep all to yourself.

FULL OF FLAVOR – Each strip of Teriyaki Beef Jerky is marinated with our special blend of soy, garlic, ginger and brown sugar. Then, it’s slow cooked over hardwood smoke for the perfect smoky flavor. It’s the perfect combo of East meets West delicious!

PERFECT EVERYDAY SNACK – How did ancient civilizations fuel themselves to cross oceans or win sword battles? Meat. If it worked for them, Jack Link’s Beef Jerky can help you power thru a late day at work, tackle your honey-do list or fuel a workout.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
